channel.title: Posts on Giovanni's Election Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Giovanni's Election Blog

item.title: Blog Post 4 - Incumbency and Expert Predictions
Blog Post 3 - Polling
item.description: In this post, I explore the predictive power of polls and update my economic fundamentals forecast model from last week with polling data.

item.title: Blog Post 2 - Fundamentals - Economy
item.description: In this post, I build two predictive models using consumer price index (CPI) and unemployment numbers as predictors for the 2022 midterms, and I compare the two models and analyze their predictive power.

item.title: Blog Post 1 - Introduction
item.description: In the first post of my election blog series, I analyze the two-party congressional voteshare margins for the 2010 and 2014 midterm elections to help determine how incumbent parties usually perform during non-presidential elections.
